sentences.cn: …将信息技术方面的工作外包的公司。

sentences.en: Are they planning to outsource the manufacturing?
sentences.cn: 他们是不是准备把生产承包给别的公司 呢 ?

sentences.en: Do what you do best and outsource the rest!
sentences.cn: 做你最擅长的,其余的外包!

sentences.en: Figure out what you are very good at doing - delegate or outsource the rest.
sentences.cn: 确定你最善于做的是什么 -- 将其它事交给别人做.

sentences.en: Figure out what you are very good at doing -- delegate or outsource the rest.
sentences.cn: 确定你最善于做的是什么 —— 将其它事委派或外包给别人做.

sentences.en: Hire, outsource, and automate in proportion to the growth of your business.
sentences.cn: 雇佣 、 外包和自动化工作要与企业的发展规模相符.

sentences.en: I think this means that you don't want to outsource your work.
sentences.cn: 你们的公司不会外包你们的业务.

sentences.en: Increasingly, corporate clients are seeking to outsource the management of their facilities.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的公司客户寻求将设施的管理外包出去。

sentences.en: It may be more cost - effective to delegate or outsource.
sentences.cn: 也许把这项工作委派或外包给别人是更加划算的.

sentences.en: Joanna: So we should outsource at a higher cost for lower quality work?
sentences.cn: 乔安娜: 所以我们就该以更高的价格外包而换来更差的工作品质 吗 ?

sentences.en: Kevin: Some of our investors are arguing that we should outsource more of our operations.
sentences.cn: 凯文: 我们公司的一些投资者认为我们应该将我们更多的运营项目外包.

sentences.en: Many companies outsource and hire consultants in order to maintain a flexible workforce.
sentences.cn: 许多公司外包和雇用咨询人员,以便保持灵活的劳动力队伍.

sentences.en: Should we outsource production or transportation?
sentences.cn: 我们是否应该将生产和运输外包?

sentences.en: The company began looking for ways to cut costs, which led to the decision to outsource.
sentences.cn: 该公司开始寻找降低成本的途径，这使他们决定外包。

sentences.en: The decision to outsource marketing was determined by the new boss.
sentences.cn: 外包市场的决定是新老板做出的.

sentences.en: The Trend of IDM Outsource and Opportunities for China Semiconductor Packaging & Testing Companies .
sentences.cn: 传统的 IDM 外包趋势与中国半导体封装产业的机遇?

sentences.en: We outsource all our computing work.
sentences.cn: 我们把全部计算机技术工作包给外边去做。

trans.tran_en: If a company outsources work or things, it pays workers from outside the company and often outside the country to do the work or supply the things

trans.tran_cn: 外购（指从外国供应商等处获得货物或服务）； 外包（工程）
